Title: Remnants of the Damned
Description:
Ever since da spirits have begun calling upon this "G'huun" me temple has been covered with the unbearable taint of the undead. 

Da undead be an abomination, but da bloodstones that create them be powerful. They could be of use ta Bwonsamdi.

If you wish ta show me your fervor, then cleanse me temple of their filth and bring me their bloodstones.
